review: it momentarily skips in streaming every so often  and has froze all together a few times.

review: Glad I made the purchase Works great

review: Love it. Had a chromecast. The stick is much better. Love the control. Downloaded voice app love that too

review: product arrived as promised and packaged well.I love the remote. Its so easy to navigate. The movies are clear, bright and well defined .

review: Very easy to use and we love it.  We can't wait to use it more when we are home.

review: We love it!  Wish we could get the CBS App on it.  If I could get local stations streaming I would totally cut the satellite!

review: I love the fire stick is a great product it will save me a lot of money .
